department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: PURGE AND REMOVAL OF SIX PROPANE TANKS, SUPPLY AND INSTALLATION OF SIX NEW PROPANE TANKS
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Tenders must be submitted on March 30, 2023, by 1400 hours EST. The requirement is for pet services to provide cleaning services for six propane tanks. The new tanks must be installed and tested by October 31, 2023
full_summary:
Go to the Ariba Discovery site to access this request for proposal:

| Title (English) | Title (French) | Reference Number | Amendment Number | Solicitation Number |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Removal, Supply, and Installation of Propane Tanks | Enlèvement, fourniture et installation de réservoirs de propane | WS3888978644-Doc3899099669 | 4 | WS3888978644 |

[Details of Tender](#details-of-tender)

The Government of Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for the contract tender for the following goods and services:

* Removal of six (6) propane tanks
* Supply of six (6) new propane tanks
* Install of six (6) new propane tanks

### Details of Tender

#### Tender Status
[Tender Status][1]

#### Tender Closing Date
March 30, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT

All bids submitted after the specified deadline will be considered non-responsive.

#### Trade Agreements
* [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)][2]

#### Regions of Opportunity
None

#### Regions of Delivery
Alberta

#### Contact Information for Bidder

| Contact Person | Email Address | Phone Number |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Melanie Perrin | melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca | Not Available |

### Note
The tender closing deadline and date has been extended from the previously specified time. All proposals must be submitted to Buyandsell by the amended deadline of March 30, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.

Please refer to the [notices][3] for more information.

[1]: https://example.com/tender-status “Tender Status Page”
[2]: https://example.com/canadian-free-trade-agreement “Canadian Free Trade Agreement”
[3]: https://example.com/notices “Notices Page”
